FuncDef: This command specifies the Python script for the specified DHCPv6 packet type in the specified direction.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the message type of the event. Values-solicit, advertise, request, confirm, renew, rebind, reply, release, decline, reconfigure, info-request, relay-forward, relay-reply.
Specifies whether the event is incoming or outgoing.
Specifies the name of the Python script up to 32 characters, that will be used to handle the specified message.
